title: Reporting system
body:
Riot why the fuck does your match making system put me with a group of three I just played with and reported for trolling and feeding straight up in the next game? Then when in champ select they talk shit and I dodge why do I have to wait for your stupidity?

Why is so much of how your system works counter intuitive and half as good as your competition.

replies.body: It is a fundamental flaw of the reporting system that you can be stuck in queue with someone you just reported. I have had it happen a few times. really sucks. Some people think that reporting someone means you wont be put in same team as them...unfortunately this isnt true. i was in 2 games and a champ select with one person that i reported in first 2 games. thankfully someone dropped the queue or i most likely would have reported the person again after another frustrating loss.
